description: Connect Chinese AI model plans: Zhipu z.ai (verified), plus Beta plan access for Kimi/Volcengine/Minimax/Aliyun (untested)
commands.Chinese-AI.manage.zhipu.title: Manage Zhipu z.ai Configuration
commands.Chinese-AI.manage.kimi.title: Manage Kimi Configuration (Beta)
commands.Chinese-AI.setApiKey.kimi.title: Set Kimi API Key (Beta)
commands.Chinese-AI.manage.minimax.title: Manage Minimax Configuration (Beta)
commands.Chinese-AI.manage.aliyun.title: Manage Aliyun Configuration (Beta)
configuration.title: Chinese AI Models
configuration.Chinese-AI.zhipu.region.de: Whether Zhipu uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.Chinese-AI.kimi.region.des: Whether Kimi uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.Chinese-AI.volcengine.regi: Whether Volcengine uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
Whether Minimax uses China mainland endpoint (true: mainland, false: overseas)
configuration.Chinese-AI.commitMessage.l: Language for generated commit messages (auto follows VS Code locale)
configuration.Chinese-AI.commitMessage.m: Preferred vendor for commit message generation (e.g. zhipu-ai, kimi-ai). Leave empty to always prompt or pick the first available model.
Preferred model id for commit message generation. When set, it takes precedence over modelVendor.
